  },

    {
      "id": "{{ET_id}}",

      "name": "IMPROVEMENTS TO THE ROAD FROM KARAKATTA TO ROHA PB ROAD VIA PUNE IN CAPITAL CITY MUMBAI",
      "code": "{{ET_code}}",
      "active": true,
      "description": "ROAD WORK ESTIMATE",
      "typeOfWork": "ROADS",
      "subTypeOfWork": null,
      "estimateTemplateActivities": [
        {
          "id": "{{ETactivity_id}}",
          "tenantId": "{{tenantId}}",

            "description": "Man power",
            "uom": "NOS"
          },
          "deleted": false
        }
      ],
      "deleted": false
    }
  ]
}
